        public java.lang.String getDescription(java.util.Locale locale)
        Description of this category for a given locale. If that doesn't exist it will return a random one. If there are no translations it will return the empty string.

      • getParent

        Parent category of this category. Null if this category is one of the roots.

      • isRoot

        public java.util.List<Category> getChildren(java.util.Comparator<Category> comparator)
        Child categories of this category. The direct children of this category are sorted with comparator.
        Parameters:
        comparator - The comparator used to sort the child categories of this category.
        Returns:
        An immutable list of child categories.

      • getPathInTree

        The path to this category in the category tree, starting with the root and ending with this category.

      • getLevel

        public int getLevel()
        The depth at which this category is in the category tree. Root categories have level one.
